title: How to Make Strawberry Shortcake with Biscuits

steps.headline: Let strawberries macerate in the refrigerator while preparing the biscuits.
Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and nutmeg.
Add whipping cream and mix dry ingredients until just moistened.
Turn out onto a lightly floured board and knead dough gently 3 to 4 times.
Cut with biscuit cutter into 1/2-inch rounds.
Do not twist cutter when cutting out biscuits.
Place on baking sheet that was sprayed with nonstick cooking spray or use parchment paper.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown.
Split the warm biscuits and top with strawberries.

text: Strawberries Wash and prepare strawberries.  Let strawberries macerate in the refrigerator while preparing the biscuits.  Biscuits Preheat oven to 425 °F (218 °C).  Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and nutmeg.  Add whipping cream and mix dry ingredients until just moistened.  Turn out onto a lightly floured board and knead dough gently 3 to 4 times.  Pat out dough to 1/2-inch thick.  Cut with biscuit cutter into 1/2-inch rounds.  Do not twist cutter when cutting out biscuits.  Place on baking sheet that was sprayed with nonstick cooking spray or use parchment paper.  Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown.  Split the warm biscuits and top with strawberries.  Serve with sweetened whipped cream.
